name: Pumpkin Birds Fall Ruffle Bloomer
description:
Dress up your little one in these stylish ruffle bottom bloomers/diaper covers! They go great with the darling little pinnies listed in the shop! 

This is 1 layer of a fun brown and orange fall themed fabric, 1 layer of a vibrant orange fabric with black dots, and 1 layer of a coordinating brown tulle material.

Colors: Orange, Brown, Black

Images By Scott Aleman Photography All Rights Reserved

name: Ice Cream Knot Dress
description:
Last 2! 

A sweet modern design! This dress uses beautiful designer fabrics that work together to create the perfect blend of color. The knots are a replacement for buttons and can be unfastened and adjusted to the necessary height as well. So fun and perfect for any occasion! Lots of girly twirl.

Colors: Brown, Hot Pink, Green, Yellow

Images By Scott Aleman Photography All Rights Reserved

name: Halli Raspberry Knot Dress
description:
Last 2! 

A sweet modern design! This dress uses beautiful designer fabrics that work together to create the perfect blend of color. The knots are a replacement for buttons and can be unfastened and adjusted to the necessary height as well. So fun and perfect for any occasion! Lots of girly twirl.

Images By Scott Aleman Photography All Rights Reserved

name: Alphabet Play Set
description:
This listing is for one full set of soft plush letters A-Z (26 Pieces Total). These soft letters are a great way to explore the alphabet with your little one. Letters can also be used as room decor for older kids or adults!

Each alphabet set comes in an array of different colors and patterns...no set is alike!
The Alphabet Set comes in your choice of boy, girl, or neutral.

Images By Scott Aleman Photography All Rights Reserved

name: Owl Pillow in Argyle
description:
Whooo doesn't love owls??

This listing is for one stuffed owl pillow made with primarily pink and brown print designer fabrics. This comfy handmade owl pillow makes the perfect gift for any occasion. It's great for both kids and adults!
 
Colors: Hot Pink, Brown, Light Pink

Images By Scott Aleman Photography All Rights Reserved

name: Chevron Wrap Dress
description:
Your little one is sure to shine in this unique handmade Chevron Wrap Dress.

This dress is designed to be reversible with tie enclosure on the inside and out. This dress reverses to a solid green with a hint of blue and green chevron. The neck is lined with a detailed ruffle collar making it the perfect accent.

The Chevron Wrap Dress can be worn alone or can be used as a layering piece which can be paired with long or short sleeve tees, leggings, or even jeans.

Colors: Green, Blue, Grey

Custom orders available upon request.
Images By Scott Aleman Photography All Rights Reserved

name: Maddie Floral Knot Dress
description:
For a limited time only..introducing the Maddie Floral Knot Dress! 

A sweet modern design! This dress uses beautiful designer fabrics that work together to create the perfect blend of color. The knots are a replacement for buttons and can be unfastened and adjusted to the necessary height as well. So fun and perfect for any occasion! Lots of girly twirl.

Colors: Grey, Yellow, Brown, White

Images By Scott Aleman Photography All Rights Reserved

name: Birthday Tee Shirt or Onesie (Customizable)
description:
This listing is for a cupcake themed birthday onesie or tee. You choose the number on the front of the tee or onesie from the drop down menu below, located at the bottom of this listing.

The hand sewn fabric flower decorated with a bright pink colored tulle. It is attached to the garment and not removable. This onesie or tee is perfect for pairing with our birthday girl ruffle bloomers.

I take custom orders so please feel free to send me an email at threeyellowstarfish@gmail.com :)

Pettiskirt sold separately.

name: Birthday Girl Ruffle Bloomers
description:
Dress up your little one in these stylish ruffle bottom bloomers/diaper covers! They go great with the darling little pinnies listed in the shop! 

This is 1 layer of a fun designer cupcake fabric, 1 layer of a coordinating dotty designer fabric, and 1 layer of super cute tulle fuchsia material.

Colors: 
White, Red, Fuchsia, Pink, Dark Pink, Orange, Yellow 

Bloomers run true to size.

description:

name: Grey Floral Reversible Pinafore
description:
This pinafore is perfect for any occasion! It consists of lovely designer fabric. This pinafore actually slips right over your little ones head but the buttons do actually unfasten. It's totally reversible! 

Wear it with our stylish diaper covers/bloomers, can be used as a shorter dress, or tunic style longer top. It could be worn over regular clothes as well as with long sleeves, short sleeves, jeans, shorts, leggings, or use it as a smock/baby apron! The possibilities are endless! This pinafore reverses to solid yellow fabric.

name: Gypsy Reversible Pinafore
description:
This pinafore is perfect for any occasion! It consists of lovely designer fabric with denim on the reverse side. This pinafore slips right over your little ones head but the buttons do actually unfasten. It's totally reversible! 2 outfits in 1!

Wear it with our stylish diaper covers/bloomers, it can be used as a shorter dress, or “tunic style” longer top. It could be worn over regular clothes as well as with long sleeves (perfect in the winter time!), short sleeves, jeans and cute boots, shorts, leggings, or use it as a smock/baby apron! The possibilities are endless!

name: Layered Cake Hair Pretty
description:
This listing is for the hair accessory seen in this listing.  The elastic band is attached to the hair accessory. Its the perfect accessory for the matching birthday sets seen on the site. 

The flower consists of Light Pink, Hot Pink, Turquoise, and Yellow layers but custom orders are available if you need a different color scheme. Email me directly at threeyellowstarfish@gmail.com for inquiries.

name: Light Pink Cupcake Number Top
description:
This listing is for a light pink cupcake onesie or tee. You can choose the number that is sewn onto the front of this onesie or t-shirt. Available in numbers 1-6, select from the drop down size menu below.

The hand sewn fabric flower is decorated with tulle and is actually sewn onto the onesie, this is not a detachable clip. 

This onesie or tee is perfect for pairing with my pinafores, bloomers, or ruffle bloomers seen on the site. I usually use Carter's brand onesies so they do run just slightly larger. I can use the Gerber brand as well if you request it, these have more of a  snug fit.

Care Instructions: 
Hand wash or machine wash on delicate in cold water. Hang to dry. Do not dry in the dryer. The heat will damage the tulle.

name: Guitar Tee or Onesie
description:
This listing is for either a onesie or a tee (you choose!) with a guitar applique on the front. See the drop down size menu below to choose.

I usually use Carter's brand onesies/tees so they do run just slightly larger. I can use the Gerber brand as well if you request it, these have more of a snug fit.

Onesies/Tee's have not been washed due to allergic reactions in some children

description:
Introducing the beautiful new hand crocheted slouch hat! Made with super soft eco-friendly yarn.

Wear it slouchy and casual or as a beret for a French look! This piece will really make you want to say "ooh la la!"

These are great to match with knot dresses or pinafores! You can also use them as a great photo prop for any occasion.

name: Guitar Set
description:
This listing is for a matching bloomer and onesie or tee set in an adorable guitar print. 

These bloomers are made of 100% cotton made of beautiful modern fabric.

Bloomers run true to size for the most part, I do size them just a tad bigger for shrinkage and growing room. I usually use Carter's brand onesies/tees so they do run just slightly larger. I can use the Gerber brand as well if you request it, these are more snug.

Fabric has not been washed due to allergic reactions in some children

name: Hoot Hoot Owl Set
description:
This listing is for a matching bloomer and onesie or tee set in an adorable owl print. Hat sold separately.

These bloomers are made of 100% cotton made of beautiful modern fabric.

Bloomers run true to size for the most part, I do size them just a tad bigger for shrinkage and growing room. I usually use Carter's brand onesies/tees so they do run just slightly larger. I can use the Gerber brand as well if you request it, these are more snug.

Fabric has not been washed due to allergic reactions in some children
